text: Ani dhongi (varakarani) musalamanannahi januna ghyave jyanna sangitale gele ki ya, allahacya margata ladha kinva satrucya hallyapasuna bacava kara, tevha te mhanale ki amhala jara he mahita asate ki ladha'i ho'ila tara avasya tumhala satha dili asati. Te tya divasi imanacya tulaneta kupra (inkara) cya adhika javala hote. Apalya mukhane asi gosta bolata hote, ji tyancya manata navhita ani allaha te janato, je he lapavitata
